body_html:
I had the same error and found out:

It works with Python 3.6.7 but not with Python 3.6.6 (see the console output below). The last line says 'ok' which is the output of the C++ application after the model was loaded.

martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ conda activate caffe2
(caffe2) martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ python --version
Python 3.6.6 :: Anaconda, Inc.
(caffe2) martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ python mymodule.py 
(caffe2) martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ ./build/example-app model.pt
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'c10::Error'
  what():  INVALID_ARGUMENT:: Cannot find field. (deserialize at /home/martin/Dev/pytorch/torch/csrc/jit/import.cpp:399)
frame #0: c10::Error::Error(c10::SourceLocation, std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&) + 0x65 (0x7fdf5cddc285 in /home/martin/Dev/pytorch/torch/lib/libc10.so)
frame #1: <unknown function> + 0x5eacaa (0x7fdf5fa32caa in /home/martin/Dev/pytorch/torch/lib/libtorch.so.1)
frame #2: torch::jit::load(std::istream&) + 0x46a (0x7fdf5fa339fa in /home/martin/Dev/pytorch/torch/lib/libtorch.so.1)
frame #3: torch::jit::load(std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&) + 0x129 (0x7fdf5fa33bf9 in /home/martin/Dev/pytorch/torch/lib/libtorch.so.1)
frame #4: main + 0x7f (0x55f610e5f244 in ./build/example-app)
frame #5: __libc_start_main + 0xeb (0x7fdf5ce1209b in /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6)
frame #6: _start + 0x2a (0x55f610e5f10a in ./build/example-app)

Aborted (core dumped)
(caffe2) martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ conda deactivate
martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ python3 --version
Python 3.6.7
martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ python3 mymodule.py 
martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ ./build/example-app model.pt
ok
martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$
body_text:
I had the same error and found out:
It works with Python 3.6.7 but not with Python 3.6.6 (see the console output below). The last line says 'ok' which is the output of the C++ application after the model was loaded.
martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ conda activate caffe2
(caffe2) martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ python --version
Python 3.6.6 :: Anaconda, Inc.
(caffe2) martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ python mymodule.py 
(caffe2) martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ ./build/example-app model.pt
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'c10::Error'
  what():  INVALID_ARGUMENT:: Cannot find field. (deserialize at /home/martin/Dev/pytorch/torch/csrc/jit/import.cpp:399)
frame #0: c10::Error::Error(c10::SourceLocation, std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&) + 0x65 (0x7fdf5cddc285 in /home/martin/Dev/pytorch/torch/lib/libc10.so)
frame #1: <unknown function> + 0x5eacaa (0x7fdf5fa32caa in /home/martin/Dev/pytorch/torch/lib/libtorch.so.1)
frame #2: torch::jit::load(std::istream&) + 0x46a (0x7fdf5fa339fa in /home/martin/Dev/pytorch/torch/lib/libtorch.so.1)
frame #3: torch::jit::load(std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&) + 0x129 (0x7fdf5fa33bf9 in /home/martin/Dev/pytorch/torch/lib/libtorch.so.1)
frame #4: main + 0x7f (0x55f610e5f244 in ./build/example-app)

martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ ./build/example-app model.pt
ok
martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$
body:
I had the same error and found out:

It **works with Python 3.6.7 but not with Python 3.6.6** (see the console output below). The last line says 'ok' which is the output of the C++ application after the model was loaded.

```
martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ conda activate caffe2
(caffe2) martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ python --version
Python 3.6.6 :: Anaconda, Inc.
(caffe2) martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ python mymodule.py 
(caffe2) martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ ./build/example-app model.pt
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'c10::Error'
  what():  INVALID_ARGUMENT:: Cannot find field. (deserialize at /home/martin/Dev/pytorch/torch/csrc/jit/import.cpp:399)
frame #0: c10::Error::Error(c10::SourceLocation, std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&) + 0x65 (0x7fdf5cddc285 in /home/martin/Dev/pytorch/torch/lib/libc10.so)
frame #1: <unknown function> + 0x5eacaa (0x7fdf5fa32caa in /home/martin/Dev/pytorch/torch/lib/libtorch.so.1)
frame #2: torch::jit::load(std::istream&) + 0x46a (0x7fdf5fa339fa in /home/martin/Dev/pytorch/torch/lib/libtorch.so.1)
frame #3: torch::jit::load(std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&) + 0x129 (0x7fdf5fa33bf9 in /home/martin/Dev/pytorch/torch/lib/libtorch.so.1)
frame #4: main + 0x7f (0x55f610e5f244 in ./build/example-app)
frame #5: __libc_start_main + 0xeb (0x7fdf5ce1209b in /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6)
frame #6: _start + 0x2a (0x55f610e5f10a in ./build/example-app)

Aborted (core dumped)
(caffe2) martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ conda deactivate
martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ python3 --version
Python 3.6.7
martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ python3 mymodule.py 
martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ ./build/example-app model.pt
ok
martin@martin-VirtualBox:~/Dev/test$ 
```
